page.title: 05Playground Games(cont.)
page.content: finished doing what they asked for, they say "Freeze."Then they have to stay in the position that they landed in when they said"Freeze". When every one has been given a go from the person in the middle,they have to stand still while the person that was in the middle comes round and tells you what you have to be. When she has told everyone what to do,she says " toy town begin."Then when every one has done what they have to do she says "Toy town go to sleep." She goes round and taps every one,but one person and every one makes a ring around her and sings "------'s got the measles ,----- 's got the measles, she's got to get out of toy town before ten o'clock." Then they count to ten and if they get out they are on and the same happens again.
